item.title: DeSantis announces plans for second immigration detention facility in north Florida
item.description: Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis’ administration is preparing to open a second immigration detention facility at a state prison in north Florida, as a federal judge decides the fate of the state’s holding center for immigrants at an isolated airstrip in the Florida Everglades dubbed “Alligator A

item.title: For these incarcerated students, online school has been a disaster
Los Angeles school year begins amid fears over immigration enforcement
